welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brierley Hill, UK! This charming town is known for its rich history and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and soak up all it has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time in Brierley Hill!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving international and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'BHX WiFi' network and follow the instructions to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
